examples.example: 我们拥有一英亩肥沃的土地，可以种植各种美丽的花卉和蔬菜。

translate.english: We have one acre of fertile land, which can be used to plant all kinds of beautiful flowers and vegetables.

examples.example: 我们在那片一英亩的果园里辛勤劳作，收获着甜蜜的果实。

translate.english: We work hard in that one-acre orchard and harvest sweet fruits.

examples.example: 我的梦想是拥有一英亩属于自己的花园，在里面尽情享受惬意的时光。

translate.english: My dream is to have an acre of my own garden and enjoy the pleasant time in it to the fullest.
